text: If anybody is interested, the Solid conference posted a bunch of videos to YouTube: <https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL055Epbe6d5Y2Jzhd7eAhpXFflvRpjqjb>

attachments.text: O'Reilly Solid brings together the people and businesses at the intersection of software and hardware: the programmable world, Internet of things, software i...
attachments.fallback: O'Reilly Solid brings together the people and businesses at the intersection of software and hardware: the programmable world, Internet of things, software i...

text: This was a conference going on while we were in SF. I don't know the official manifesto, but it certainly seems to hit at a number of points relevant to us: hardware, software, users, design, building, etc. Take a peek when you have a chance. Share any that strike a chord.
